She was professional and knew what she was doing. I also bought some of her natural products. I'll be coming back for a Mani pedi soon

text: By far THEE WORST Brazilian wax experience I’ve had in 4 years of waxing. Evonne is a novice esthetician advertising services she’s is not able to execute properly. She definitely talks more than she works it was a nightmare completely. DO NOT I repeat DO NOT waste your money or time.

Had
I had a kids spa party and staff was so friendly. I had great birthday party.

text: I got a massage and it was heavenly... I will be back

name: Tiffany Johnson
text: Very nice staff it's everything you need and if they don't have it you can request it

name: Jen Boyd
text:
I heard about JSB&M upcoming business via social media and the news. I was so excited, because it's "FUBU." I knew for a fact the next time I visit home (Alabama, I live in Florida) I will be patronizing the business.

From the moment I walked through the door I was greeted and the atmosphere was so warm and welcoming. I was amazed to see a nail technician and a hair styles working. It was an amazing feeling to see other small businesses merchandise being supported and sold in JSB&M also.

I have been to many beauty supply stores, but I have NEVER seen one like J. Stew's. Me knowing and understand like many upcoming businesses it takes time to grown. She did not have everything I wanted, but she did have everything I needed. The prices are beyond reasonable, the staff is very friendly and professional and I left out knowing and feeling that I am in the process of witnessing the start of something amazing. I wish the owner so much success in her business endeavors. I pray she's able to have stores beyond her expectations and continue to change the lives of many in our community.

If you have not been, I urge you to go and support. Also if they don't have it, they can work on getting it!!! At this point I'll have to figure out a way to order online with JSB&M. They have my full support!!!

name: Gigi Ton
text: I love going in beauty supply stores..so much stuff to look at and you have many choices..

name: Parisea Story
text: Love Kash's Beauty Supply Store! Very warm and lovely place! Fantastic for V.I.P treatment, variety and low prices.

text: In need of a great eyelash tech? she is the one! Sterile and professional. Her appointments never overlap like the shops. And her work has bn my best I've experienced. My real lashes dont fall out like when others do them.

text: Can you say AWESOME... MY LASHES ARE SUPER PRETTY 😍 I literally went to Moons spa in Trussville and the owner swore and was curious about my lashes ,"I'm like no you didn't do these🤣 Tips Enticing Lashes did... Thanks Tip new name Lashes

text: I had a great experience! It was a peaceful environment and not only did my lashes look natural, but they lasted longer than I expected. I would definitely be going back!

name: Tiffany Phillips
text: I had a great time getting my lash extensions done. Her prices are great and I also got 5 pair of strips to take home and they where not expensive. Most places it can be uncomfortable but it was very relaxing and welcoming. Tonita is a sweetheart and i cant wait to go back.

name: Dee Daniels
text: I absolutely LOVE Tips Enticing Minks I must say I’m a regular customer now😬!!! She is very neat, professional, and takes pride in her work! She genuinely cares for her clients and the work she does 💜 I would definitely recommend her service!!

text: My wife and my I have 4 crazy boys. We took them there and was the best experience we have had at any barber before. I my self got a clean shaved head and a great beard trim. This is our new spot. I would extremely recommend to anyone.

Consultations are always free! I also travel for formal events.

name: Candy Prestage
text: This is a great, awesome, wonderful Beautician. She put color in my hair that lasted 6 months and still had color. She does a wonderful job on cutting and styling also. I don't believe I could ever find someone as kind and as professional as she is.

name: rebecca smith
text: Such a great family friendly environment. The management staff is top notch. Run here. My babies have grown up here getting their hair done. My 9 year old loves getting her nails painted as well. Ask for Olivia when you go. Best hair place in Mobile.

name: Yuliya Ugay Brown
text: Stuff is very nice and  friendly. But I asked not to cut hair from the ears and see what happened... He had ears covered with hair.

name: Shianna simpson
text: Absolutely loved them!! Went for the first time today & i felt so welcomed & was treated GREAT!! Highly recommend them!!

name: Tamara Perry
text: Wonderful salon for my 7 year old. It's fun and they have fun products. She loves it every time we go!

name: Katie A Barnett
text:
I just stumbled upon Knots Salon simply because I needed my haircut ASAP. I called on a Saturday and was able to get an appointment that same day!
The salon's setup is so chic! I immediately fell in love with the ambience. I have thick natural curly hair so I am always nervous having my haircut by someone new. When I scheduled my appointment I requested someone who has experience with cutting curly hair...and of course that's exact stylist I got! I was just a walk-in expecting to get my hair cut and go back to my original stylist after her leave, but instead Knots Salon just got another regular client!!!
I also tell everyone about this place because I was shocked that I didn't know about it!
I love Knots Salon for life
...Katie Barnett

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great compliment.  We certainly appreciate your business and will always strive to give you a 5 star experience.

name: Ashley Davis
text: We absolutely love Knots Salon! It's so inviting for kids, which is hard to find. We took our 2 year old, who is a very busy body, to Knots Salon for his first haircut. Angela is who we chose and she did absolutely AMAZING! She listened and did exactly what we asked. She was great and oh so patient with him! There's no where else our kiddos will go for any hair needs.

name: Amanda Negri
text: Amazing! Ms. Olivia was so great with our son and he loved it! Easy experience!

name: Raven Hamil
text: I love taking my child to get his hair cut at Knots! The staff are so sweet and very good at what they do. Leighana is so patient and takes the time to make sure she makes my son's hair look great! Would recommend Knots Salon to everyone I know. Especially for kids haircuts.

name: Amber A
text: Absolutely wonderful customer service! They pierced my daughter's ears, both at the same time and she got her first haircut and her very first Manicure💅

name: Mary Boice
text: Angela is always out to give me the exact hair style I want!  She didn't cut too much hair off the way other hair dresser do.  She is very sweet!  She has lots of experience!  You definitely want to ask for Angela!  She's the best!!

name: asten hamil
text: Knots is a really good salon especially for kids. Leighana does a really good job cutting my nephew's hair.

name: James Hudson
text: Inexperienced people run this place . Don’t set a appointment if your hair is “to thick “ because they will turn you down after waiting a week for your appointment.. horrible service . Anyone getting hair colored would definitely not recommend this place they clearly are inexperienced

resp.text: We are so sorry you did not have a good experience at our salon! It is our goal to provide excellent service for all of our customers. Unfortunately, the appointment scheduled online did not allow enough time for us to give you the color you were looking for. We hate that we disappointed you and hope that we can make it up to you. Please call us at 251-635-1313.

name: Reyna Coleman
text: We absolutely adore Ms. Olivia. She’s patient, kind, & caring.

name: Kristy Dyess
text: We love Olivia and everyone there. Michael has been going there since he was 1 and he is now 12!

name: Brittany Kimbrough
text: This morning, I made the mistake of taking my children to another salon. My daughter’s hair was long, halfway down her back, and I wanted 3 inches trimmed off. The girl butchered it and before I knew it, my daughter had an uneven bob above her shoulders and the girl just kept cutting and cutting on top of repeatedly blaming my daughter for not sitting still and blaming another customer for talking to my daughter and making her talk while she was cutting her hair. I refused to let her touch my son’s hair, we hopped in the car, and drove to Knots Salon. By the time I got there, I was in tears. ANGELA SAVED THE DAY. She fixed my daughter’s hair and gave my son a great cut, too. I will never take my kids anywhere else! Take your kids to Knots and ask for Angela. She works miracles and is so great with the kids.

name: Jennifer Hall
text: Great with first hair cuts and kids love to come!  They can’t wait to come back and sit in the cars. As a parent, it’s so convenient to be able to schedule appointments online.

name: Katie Ladnier
text: Very pleased. She only cut what I asked and was very understanding and easy to talk to. Enjoyed the shop itself aswell.

name: Megan Rushing
text: Best haircut and color I've had it years. Latisha Speese did amazing work with my long thick hair. Will return and can't wait to bring my daughter.

name: Ethan Bryant
text: Love getting my haircut at Knots. I've gotten my haircut by several stylist and all are pretty great at men's hair. The always use a warm towel when shampooing my hair, and give a great neck shave. Highly recommend.

resp.text: We love that you enjoy our services.  Thank you so very much for the great review.

name: Jessica Tillman
text: Marley did a great job on my 2 year old boy. First time haircut, and she was patient and kind, and most of all fast!! I got to keep his curls! We will be back for all his cuts. Love this place

resp.text: Thank you very much for the awesome review.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Marley is great and she loves children and what she does! Can't wait to see you!

name: Andrea Timberlake
text: We kids love Knots Salon! It’s a very kid friendly atmosphere, yet great for adults to relax and get chic too!

name: Grandmaster
text: Only professionals here with positive attitude s. The owner is great and has a reflection on her employees. By appt only. Also equipped with unique powerwheels stools for kids haircuts.

name: Vanessa Madere
text: Friendly staff and great haircuts in a cute salon

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind review.  It really means a lot!

name: Holly Reynolds
text: They always do a great job with my toddler.  He used to hate haircuts but is always so well behaved here!

name: Abigail Stjohn
text: Very open and friendly staff. Perfect for families! Left the salon with smiles all around! Also LOVE the selection of bath bombs!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to give us this fabulous review. We really appreciate it!! We work really  hard to serve our guests and love to hear that we did a fantastic job.

name: Andrew Hardin
text: My delightful sister works here!! Great place!!

name: Will Hudson
text: Great haircut experience. The salon was excellent and on time.

name: Audrey Wright
text: Perfect for a birthday spa day.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review.  We love doing spa days for children and adults.  We will even open after hours if needed to fit your needs.  We love what we do!!

name: Ida Grooms
text: Great service with a smile.  A must visit for all your Avon shopping needs

name: G. Crawford
text: Avon products and more... Call ahead before you go.

resp.text: Thank you so much yes we have temporary hours adjustments...we appreciate your continued support.  Thank you for allowing us to serve you and your family

name: Kieys j
text: All your Avon needs sold here.

resp.text: Thank you for being a valuable customer

name: Stephanie Sanderson-Garrett
text: My cousin recommended Tam's when I moved here about 18 months ago.    The experience was great, and I've been going there ever since.  A huge plus for me is her timeliness.  Not only does she take you on time, but she also doesn't make you wait in between stations.  She's professional, does great work, and cares about the health of your hair.  And, the customer service is great.  I highly recommend!!

name: Sascha Blackburn
text: Everyone is very friendly, and Kia is amazing.  My daughter loves her sisterlocks!

name: Dee
text:
I've been using Tam's Natural Solutions Cosmetics for about 2 years and I love it!  I get a press and curl.  There are so many different types of services offered and all are awesome!
Tam makes her own products and she knows what she is doing.  My hair has  grown so much since she has been taking care of it with her products.
I recommend this business to anyone who wants to get the best hair care.

name: Bree Fornis
text: I went to Tam for the first time for a deep conditioning, trim, and silk press. Tam is professional, kind, and knowledgeable. She definitely taught me a few things about caring for my hair! She was right on time and got me in and out pretty quick. I will definitely be back and be recommending her to my natural friends!

name: Erin Coffey
text: I'm someone who is very particular about who touches my hair. Tam did an amazing job! She used her own products (which smelled amazing) and gave me the silkiest silk press I've ever seen. Not only that, but she is really nice and super professional. No waiting around hours for her to start, and her time estimates per service are very accurate. I'd recommend Tam to any and everyone!

name: ms p
text: This is a very professional and comfortable environment to get hair services. I love it!

name: Tish Lowman
text: It a very nice place . I really enjoy getting my hair done there.  I would recommend it to anyone.

name: Chandra Bozeman
text: Tamara is an expert on growing and styling hair. Her natural, homemade, plant derived products are a MUST and are great for all types of hair!

name: Natalie Ross
text:
Kia is absolutely awesome she always does a great job with my hair and every time my hair feels great after.
Thank you Kia.

name: Malaysia Ford
text: She’s the best there is. I don’t trust anyone else with my hair!

name: Courtney Sibley
text: My V-Steam experience was awesome. Not only was the experience serene and relaxing but it was also educational as well. Tamara and her staff make sure you understand the process, answer any and all questions and they make sure you are comfortable throughout the entire experience.  They make sure you feel pampered. V-Steam is wonderful for the health of your “V” and I would recommend that  EVERY WOMAN at least try it. You will not regret it!!!

name: A Vines
text: Tamara was highly recommended by a friend for her knowledge of how to “care for” damaged hair and revive it to health again. Upon my initial “consultation” visit with my two daughters, we were greeted professionally and welcomed to a warm and inviting salon. Tamara immediately assessed our hair, diagnosed our situation & gave us written prescriptions to take home to care for our hair. She did not attempt to keep secrets to get us to come back. Her honesty and professionalism turned our “consultation” visit into an appointment for all three of us. Tamara’s team immediately went to work. They continued to assess, diagnosis, treat our hair and scalp, and prescribe solutions to revive our hair. Tamara’s passion is hair, healthy hair. She is committed to educating people of all ethnicities about how to care for their hair. And yes, Tamara’s knowledge and expertise crosses ethnic and racial barriers as she has client testimonials from all ethnicities and races. To say that my daughters and I highly recommended Tam’s Natural Solutions would be an understatement. Book your appointment today!

name: Melvin Johnson
text: Tams men products go hard.  Tams products have its own natural scents that us men love. Don’t smell like hair or other grooming products.  If you have waves in your hair you will love the sea sick. The products are great.  Ohhhhj can’t leave the ladies out you you know Tam got y’all. Go out check her out

name: Leah Fields
text: Tam is a cutting edge hair stylist who offers customized packages to suit her clients needs. She emphasizes maintaining or obtaining healthy hair by using the best products and exploring a variety of hairstyles to compliment her clients. If you have natural hair or wear protective hair styles, call her today to book your consultation because you will be extremely satisfied with her services. In addition, her staff provides exceptional customer service.

name: J Bolton
text:
The stylist, salon, and the products are wonderful. 4 out of 5 people in my household have drastically different hair types and the products work for all of us.

I love the Lather series of soap—especially the charcoal with the tea tree oil, the smell is so crisp. I like the lavender as well. I love the shampoo, conditioner, gel, and hair and scalp oil.

I love everything! I just had a mini haul last Saturday.

Also, you will not find a better stylist. Every time I get “out of the chair” it’s a new me!

In addition,the shop is always clean and bright. And, I’m never in the shop waiting longer than necessary (which is very important to me!)

I like that I can make appointments from my phone and the establishment takes credit and debit with the ability to add a tip.

Is there any more I can say? Check it out for yourself 💕💕💕.

name: Rhoda Francis
text: Can’t say more about this places and the ladies here. Tamara and Brenda are the absolute best at what they do. Always so welcoming and friendly — hair looks amazing! I come every week and have been for over a year now and I am so happy with my hair. It is always glowing. So healthy. Love them!! Thank you!

name: Angela Baker
text: I would like to thank Lagunza for introducing me to the Yoni steam, and full body  Detox. My daughter and I enjoyed our time together and it was such a pleasant experience, that we plan to come back monthly.Thank you Tam, for such a warm, friendly and professional environment, that was a plus. We welcome all natural products, thanks for educating us on your natural products, can't wait to try our soap.

name: D
text: This salon is amazing! Tamara cares about your the health of your hair while maintaining a fresh look. She specializes in natural hair care and knows different hair types. She can accommodate my sensitive skin, scalp and fine hair. My hair has never been this long in my adult life. I've been going to Tamara for about 8 years and is truly satisfied!

name: Jada Pettaway
text: This is the best hair salon ever. Tamara know what she is doing. I love that all her hair products are natural and she makes them herself. When you have an appointment you never have to wait. Your appointment time is your appointment time. Her Assistant Mrs. Brenda is wonderful as well. I have never had a salon experience like this and will never go anywhere else

name: MyGirlJay
text: Love this place and it's spa-like atmosphere. The ladies are knowledgeable, funny, smart, and professional. They take care of you from your head to your toes and everything between. You leave there not only looking better but feeling better.

name: Patricia Estell
text: I highly recommend Tams Hair Salon. Very friendly ladies in a clean, beautiful salon. The atmosphere was pleasant and the services were offered in a professional manner. I will be making another appointment.

name: Sonya Wimpye
text: I’ve been going to Tam for a few years now and have yet to be disappointed. My daughter and I both go to Tam for all our natural hair needs. Shes the only one I trusted to dye my daughter’s curly hair a lighter color. She’s extremely professional and knowledgeable on all hair types. The atmosphere of the salon is warm, friendly & clean. My daughter and I will be back soon!!!

name: Tim Ingram
text: Major shout out to Tam and Lagunza for my birthday hook up!! Guys stop by and try their new men's line, Tell them Tim sent u to try the new Beast Mode shave & Shower Gel as well as the Alpha Man Conditioner!!!

name: Michelle Cochran
text: Tam’s Natural Solution the products are amazing and very affordable. I have used the shampoo, conditioner, silk out, body butter, body salt, hair reconstructor and several of the body soaps. I rate each product a 5, they are all the excellent and range in line or above any other brand. I recommend that you buy Tam’s Natural Solution, it’s great!

name: Niki Werkheiser
text: I highly recommend Tamara for all your hair care needs! I’ve been going to Tamara for 13 years and she is nothing less than amazing! And now she’s branching out into organic lotions, soaps, etc. and her products are fantastic. Check her out! #supportsmallbusiness

name: Chenelle Ball
text: Had my first Yoni steam today. I must say it was very relaxing! I felt all the week's woes just slip away. The herb smell amazing!! Tam and her team made me very comfortable. From now on the Yoni steam will be a part of my regimen.

name: Eko Cuisine
text: Tamara is simply the best I know, friendly and wonderful members staff and they will always give you the best... try and see for yourself

name: Whitney Heard
text: Tams salon is awsome! She gets me in and out in a timely fashion! Her hand-crafted products are the best, and this is my forever salon!

name: Nichole Staples
text: Tamara has been my stylist for over 15 years. She never disappoints. She always know what style that better suits me. Skin products are amazing. Thanks Tamara❤️

name: Amberly G
text: Tamara is an amazing stylist ! She knows exactly what your hair needs . The salon has a great atmosphere. I always leave pleased and ready for my next visit ! ! You won’t regret making an appointment with her.

name: julie jolly
text: Love this lady. She takes really good care of me and my mom's hair. If you are looking to rock a short hair do, then you need to call Tamara today.

name: Jasmine Spruill-Young
text:
Yesterday, I experienced my 2nd yoni steam at Tam's Natural Solution. My first steam was 2 weeks ago and I had no idea what to expect from the treatment. The customer service was amazing. Prior to my first appointment,  I had questions, so I messaged Tam and she got me in touch with Gunza. Gunza called me and chatted with me about the benefits of the steam and how it would assist me with personal health goals. At the time, I had heard about the benefits of the steam and thought I would try it.

My first appointment was amazing. Gunza and Tam greeted me with a smile and took me to a private place  to chat. It was a personal experience with a service that catered to your comfort. My second appointment was no different in terms of customer service. This time, I was provided a blend of herbs for my personal health need. I had a consultation with Tam and she told me more about the things that would be beneficial to me.

name: Lechara Fletcher
text: Outstanding service. I have never had a bad experience at Tams. Her handmade products are awesome. I have been using them consistently for several months

name: Andrea Boswell
text: Clean inviting atmosphere.  My hair is healthy and styled to perfection every time! Highly recommend the hair products

name: Chari Carter
text: I had my first V-Steam and I must say the atmosphere was so peaceful and it smells absolutely amazing in the shop. Tamara and her staff made me feel so comfortable and at ease and I and looking forward to my next appointment!

name: Matique Redus
text: Had an amazing first experience here! Tamara and Brenda are both so sweet and professional, and my hair has never looked or felt better! Can’t wait for my next appointment!!

name: Brenda Patterson
text: I had my 1st v steam appointment a week ago, I must confess that I was  leery .The salon was inviting and the staff was super friendly, this instantly put me at ease.i left feeling completely relaxed.i wold recommend anyone who’s interested in having a vsteam done use Tam’s you want be disappointed

name: Brandon Faiella
text: I bought some beard oil and some soap from her and it is by far the best I’ve used. Plus, it’s all organic so I’m not worried about putting a bunch of chemicals on my skin

name: Jason Pearce
text: I have been going to Tamara since I moved to the area. She does a great job cutting my hair!

name: Lisa allen
text:
I made an appt for my mother and I.  Spoke extensively to Brenda explained we would come in 15 mins early to fill out paperwork.   Drove over an hour.   When we got there the place was locked up and no lights on.  When we talked to someone they said they gave our appts to someone else.....not sure how that's possible when we were there and there were no cars in parking lot and lights were off.  Looks like they decided to take day off instead of keeping appointment that was scheduled for days.  Horrible customer service and really put us out of our way...3 hours round trip driving w no apology.

In regards to your response that is not true at all.  When I talked to someone on the phone they said they gave our appts to someone else and we could come back at 6:00.

I also explained when I made the appt I could not go online because I did not have service I was traveling.  Which is why we agreed that we would come in early.

The fact that you are saying we didnt show up is an out right lie.

resp.text: We so sorry you had a bad experience.  We pride ourselves with customers service.   We requested that you make online appointment, but we made special accommodations for your appointment.   In preparation for your appointment for  today we arrived early and no one was here.  We even checked the cameras, there must be a miscommunication.   Please email us so that we can resolve this!

name: Barbara Donovan
text: I keep coming back to Tamara time and time again for her experience, professionalism, value and fast service. She makes me shine.😊

name: Yarnell Mutumba
text: Great atmosphere! Tam is extremely professional and knowledgeable about hair health! The time spent there was pleasant and fast!

name: Tonya Washington
text: Excellent service. Tam is down to earth and has such a good spirit! She's my new stylist!

name: Erika Harvey
text: Not only is Tamara a talented and knowledgeable stylist, she also makes her styling products to promote hair health.

name: Pamela Tippit
text: Tam was able to help repair and grow my fragile and damaged hair all while making me feel right at home! A that was a HUGE task! I also love the smell and feel of her organic products ❤

text: Tam’s products are amazing,  the service from Tamara and her staff are excellent. I wouldn’t go anywhere else.

text: When we went for appt, the building was locked and no one was there. I guess because we were from out of town, they really didn't care. It wasted half a day of our vacation, but I guess it wasn't a concern for them.

name: Shaniqua Appleton
text: It's a great store with a big variety. However, I never get to explore and shop in peace. I like to look around at stuff on my own but the worker is always following me and asking questions like "what am I looking for" and trying to direct me in different directions when all I want to do is look around in peace. It really frustrates me. And I don't ever carry a purse or big coat n there, just my wallet so I don't see the point in getting followed n redirected because I'm not a thief.

name: Henry Croes
text: Good experience and good customer service,if you ask for help they will definitely recommend good products and the most natural possible for your hair thanks.

name: Kymberlee Nicole
text: The best beauty store I've ever been in and I've been in a few. Everything is so organized and neat!

name: Tanyeka B
text: They had everything we needed. Everyone was so nice and helpful.

name: Deborah Payne
text: It has great prices and the retailers are always so nice and helpful. Everything I have bought from there has been awesome and works so well.

name: RHEC Cornbread
text: Queens beauty was excellent .

name: Rodie Bell
text: Tried returning a brand new curling iron never opened they would not let make their own rules because of COVID 19 that’s bs they just made those rules not shopping their ever again

resp.text: Sorry for your inconvenience,But due to the Covid-19 pandemic we are not able to take returned items purchased at this present time

name: S Wyatt
text:
Such a great variety of anything you could possibly need for hair care. Very surprising at how reasonable the prices are. Staff/service was immediate and welcoming without feeling stressed. Fantastic gift we have here in E. Gadsden. Wish I'd visited sooner. Easy access parking, plenty of handicapped space in and outside of store. Would love to see our community support local businesses. ESPECIALLY one as exceptional as this one. I'll definitely be back for more styles knowing how affordable and with such an extensive collection of both real and synthetic products. Thanks for making me feel less anxiety about
being sick with a fast, balding scalp.

resp.text:
Thank you,and hope to
see you soon.

name: Jerri Wiley
text: I would have given them a 5 star but they have their Floor Runner harass you time you walk through the door and follow you all over the store. It makes it hard for you to concentrate on what you came to the store to buy.

resp.text:
I'll make you feel better next time...
We try~~`^ ^••

text: Great location. People are so friendly and eager to help. Plenty to choose from. Environment is clean. Music is fantastic. It is Christian contemporary. Love this place.

text: Be prepared to be watched! They have security buzzers on ALL the merchandise! They have someone walking around constantly! And they have security cameras, everywhere!

resp.text:
It's all the same everywhere...
We try to do the best service...
Come again. I'll do my best.

name: Betty GRAY
text: Bought face sheild.

name: Rosella Jones
text: I normally do not leave reviews,but this one time I did:As I’m  reading down this review list of customers since months ago,I see No changes.Which tells that the Owner nor Workers just message back,But with No change.Me and my Family was followed the entire time of being in the store.The Floor Runner(older lady) was rude as though she did not won't my child walking in there period..(when my child was just standing/walking right by my side)The floor was Cluttered,so I had eyes on mine before she did.From the time we entered until the time,we left out with no service..WE WILL NOT RETURN!

resp.text: Thank you. I'll try to do better.
